package.name: french-accents
package.author: Otto Piramuthu
package.description: A package to type French with a non-French keyboard layout. It works by replacing keywords like e' with é.
package.title: French Accents

manifest.author: Otto Piramuthu
manifest.description: A package to type French with a non-French keyboard layout. It works by replacing keywords like e' with é.
manifest.name: french-accents
manifest.title: French Accents

value.readme:
A simple package to conveniently type French with a non-French keyboard layout.
Text expansions match Vim's `:digraph` commands.

# Lowercase Accents

| Keyword | Replaced |
| --- | --- |
| `e'`| é |
| `` e` `` | è |
| `e^` | ê |
| `e:` | ë |
| `o^` | ô |
| `` a` `` | à |
| `a^` | â |
| `i^` | î |
| `i:` | ï |
| `` u` `` | ù |
| `u^` | û |
| `u:` | ü |
| `oe` | œ |
| `ae` | æ |
| `y:` | ÿ |
| `c,` | ç |

# Uppercase Accents

| Keyword | Replaced |
| --- | --- |
| `E'`| É |
| `` E` `` | È |
| `E^` | Ê |
| `E:` | Ë |
| `O^` | Ô |
| `` A` `` | À |
| `A^` | Â |
| `I^` | Î |
| `I:` | Ï |
| `` U` `` | Ù |
| `U^` | Û |
| `U:` | Ü |
| `OE` | Œ |
| `AE` | Æ |
| `Y:` | Ÿ |
| `C,` | Ç |

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# French Accents

matches:
  - trigger: "e'"
    replace: "é"

  - trigger: "e`"
    replace: "è"

  - trigger: "e^"
    replace: "ê"

  - trigger: "e:"
    replace: "ë"

  - trigger: "o^"
    replace: "ô"

  - trigger: "a`"
    replace: "à"

  - trigger: "a^"
    replace: "â"

  - trigger: "i^"
    replace: "î"

  - trigger: "i:"
    replace: "ï"

  - trigger: "u`"
    replace: "ù"

  - trigger: "u^"
    replace: "û"

  - trigger: "u:"
    replace: "ü"

  - trigger: "oe"
    replace: "œ"

  - trigger: "ae"
    replace: "æ"

  - trigger: "y:"
    replace: "ÿ"

  - trigger: "c,"
    replace: "ç"

  - trigger: "E'"
    replace: "É"

  - trigger: "E`"
    replace: "È"

  - trigger: "E^"
    replace: "Ê"

  - trigger: "E:"
    replace: "Ë"

  - trigger: "O^"
    replace: "Ô"

  - trigger: "A`"
    replace: "À"

  - trigger: "A^"
    replace: "Â"

  - trigger: "I^"
    replace: "Î"

  - trigger: "I:"
    replace: "Ï"

  - trigger: "U`"
    replace: "Ù"

  - trigger: "U^"
    replace: "Û"

  - trigger: "U:"
    replace: "Ü"

  - trigger: "OE"
    replace: "Œ"

  - trigger: "AE"
    replace: "Æ"

  - trigger: "Y:"
    replace: "Ÿ"

  - trigger: "C,"
    replace: "Ç"
